channel.title: How to Get RapidShare Premium Feature
channel.description:
It can do: -Download very fast as RapidShare Premium -No Download limit -Easy to do - Easy Proxy System - Direct Link - No installation, just open and get rapidshare premium feature
[u][b] Download the RapidShare Grabber here: [/b][/u] http://rapidshare.com/files/45983262/Mega-codez.net.rar rar password:www.mega-codez.net
[b][u]TUT: [/u][/b]
[img]http://i8.tinypic.com/4l4o3ns.png[/img] 1.Copy the RapidShare URL you want to download. Copy it! [img]http://i11.tinypic.com/67x14dv.png[/img]
2. Extract the Rapidshare Premium Grabber.zip
[img]http://i13.tinypic.com/61novfl.png[/img]
3. Open the Grabber.exe [img]http://i10.tinypic.com/6fhrfx5.png[/img]
4. Paste the URL in the program, then press GRAB, wait for a while, and you should hear a sound!
[img]http://i9.tinypic.com/623s4sk.png[/img]
5. Press the DOWNLOAD button, and prepare for the fast downloading, instantly! 6. Result: [img]http://i13.tinypic.com/6aouil0.png[/img]
IF YOU WENT PASS YOUR DOWNLOAD LIMIT, READ HERE on how to bypass using easy proxies. 7. Press EDIT near the Proxy info line. 8. Go to [URL=http://proxy-list.org/en/]http://proxy-list.org/en/[/URL] , then put in your option (Port, Country, Type, etc..), then find the list of proxies. CLICK download Full List. After you download them, highlight and copy all the proxies in there. [img]http://i15.tinypic.com/52dstch.png[/img] [img]http://i18.tinypic.com/662ceuh.png[/img]
9. Paste the proxies after the line specifically in the picture.
10. After that, just save it. 11. Once you get to the program Grabber.exe, you can see a list f proxies under the proxy list. [img]http://i17.tinypic.com/4mahnux.png[/img] 12. Choose one, or choose the top, then click AUTO ROTATE, and it will go through all to the proxy list and find the working one that works with rapidshare.com/de, so do w.e while u wait, u will hear a sound. And it won't take that long it if happend to find a updated version, so always go check the site.
ANOTHER ALTERNATE UPDATED PROXY SITE IS: [URL=http://www.publicproxyservers.com/page1.html]http://www.publicproxyservers.com/page1.html[/URL] (with the most fastest, non-laggiest proxies ever, updated everyday)
[URL=http://www.samair.ru/proxy/]http://www.samair.ru/proxy/[/URL] (Updated every hour, and happens to be the most popular proxy ip list site!)
[URL=http://proxy-list.org/en/]http://proxy-list.org/en/[/URL] (The most easiest, updated, best proxy list ever. With its unique updates , every ten minutes, and its easier copy-n-paste option from dowloading a whole list. RECOMMENDED
[b]CREDIT TO FORUMW[/b]
